column4: Can I change the folder apache2 starts in (/var/www) to something else?
Certainly. Edit the /etc/apache2/sites-availble/default
Or, create a new file in /etc/apache2/sites-availble, link it into /etc/apache2/sites-enabled and remove /etc/apache2/sites-enabled.
